transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Ha sir boliye na.
Executive: Ji sir good afternoon.
Customer: Good afternoon bataiye.
Executive: Main bol raha hun maine product to update kar diye hain.
Hmm.
Executive: Ha ek bar agar aap laptop pe hi ho to bas panch minute aapka time lagega aa jate hain.
Customer: Kya karna hai?
Executive: Ek to usme chhe no price wale hain.
Matlab uska price thoda sa confusion tha to wo price update kar le sir aur bas wahi bas price ka hi hai baki to specifications wagera add kar diya tha maine.
Hmm, thik hai batao.
Executive: Alright.
Executive: Ispe no price pe click kariye.
Hmm.
Customer: Plastic adhesive bandage roll.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: 10 into four wale ye kitne ka hoga?
Executive: Ek bar aur image bhi I think box 10 into four box aur 10 into 40.
Customer: Nahi box hai na sir ye image dekhiye na image to box wala hai.
Customer: Ha matlab main puch raha hun actually maine open nahi kara hai.
Executive: Achcha achcha achcha iska dal do iska dal do 159.
Executive: Box.
Customer: 159.
Executive: Thik hai.
Executive: Aur ye ye bhi box ka hi hai.
Customer: Ek minute ek minute.
Executive: 1 meter.
Customer: 1 meter na?
Executive: Ek minute sir main thoda sa mujhe lag raha hai na ek minute rukiye main refresh kar lu to 10 by four do bar dala gaya lag raha hai.
Customer: Ek teen ek teen mein dala tha one wala bataiye.
Customer: One one 10 into 1 meter ka box bataiyega.
Executive: 50 59 rupees.
Customer: 159.
Executive: 59.
Executive: Kyun?
Customer: 59.
Customer: 59.
Executive: Thik hai.
Executive: Aur ek 10 into four box ka bataiyega.
Customer: Box ka 112 plus.
Customer: Teen wala to I think 169 hai right?
Customer: Ye box wala aap dal do 159 rupees 10 by four.
Hmm.
Executive: Aur teen wala sir 169 ka hai right?
Customer: 169 hai barabar.
Executive: Thik hai.
Executive: Microporous non ha sir ek bar agar open kar lete to jyada achcha rehta.
Hmm, ek minute.
Customer: Ha bataiye.
Executive: Yaha pe no price likha hua hai matlab wo usme meeting meeting ka link hai kuch de rahe ho kya screen ke liye?
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Ha ye jo aapne dala hai na ha ye aapne is dala hai na 3 inch 9.1 meter hai aur 9.1 meter aap le lo 135 plus four 189 rupees.
Executive: Mic ye non woven surgical tape ka hai?
Customer: Ha 9.1 meter mein jo paper tape hai na uska 189 rupees.
Executive: 189 thik hai.
Executive: Ye absorbent cotton wool roll 400 gram jo red color mein usme paper mein.
Customer: Ek minute.
Customer: 400 gram paper packing.
Customer: 155.
Executive: Aur 300 gram wala jo blue color ke papers mein.
Customer: 100 119.
Executive: Thik hai.
Executive: Ab bacha.
Executive: Ye absorbent cotton wool roll hai matlab poly pack mein hai 500 gram ka.
Customer: Aapko packaging size dikha hai 50 rolls per iska dal do 190.
Customer: 185 kar do ek kam.
Executive: Ji sir bataiye.
Customer: 185.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: 185.
Customer: Hello.
Customer: Abhishek sir aawaz aa rahi hai?
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello aawaz aa rahi hai sir hello.
Customer: Ha ha.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer needed to update product prices.

- Customer needed price for 10*4 bandage roll.

Resolution:

- Executive assisted in updating product prices.

- Provided prices for different bandage rolls.



Next Steps: 

- Issue resolved.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Positive



@@@Key Topics:

- price update, product prices, bandage roll
